title: Should Dominion (Crystal Scar) be implemented into OCE?
body: Your thoughts on this? It was my favourite game mode back in NA, the intensity of the game mode supported by the epic music made it one of my best experiences in League. I understand the population in oce is low, but what about the people who want to play it? Oceania doesn't get many opportunities, and I think this would be a treat for us.
